\caption{Performance Summary. All benchmarks on Apple Silicon (M1/M3), macOS 26.x, N=1000 iterations after 10 warmup runs. Wire Size counts payload-only handshake bytes (MessageA + MessageB + 2$\times$Finished); loopback wire sizes including transport overhead are reported separately in Table~\ref{tab:baseline-comparison} and Supplementary Table~\ref{tab:supp-loopback-wire}. Data-plane AEAD is fixed to AES-256-GCM in v1, so throughput is independent of the negotiated handshake suite; throughput measured post-handshake on 1~MiB payloads.}
